DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine whether labor induction 37 week pregnancy improve baby 's health birth compare delivery later point pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Timing Delivery Fetal Growth Restriction Uncomplicated Women
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy Gestational age 34 week 0 day 37 week 0 day time enrollment Dating pregnancy last menstrual period consistent ultrasound , ultrasound < 21 week 6 day gestation , know date conception set vitro fertilization No known major anomaly ( anomaly require surgery antenatally neonatal period , anomaly compatible life determine physician ) FGR define estimate fetal weight ( EFW ) < 10th percentile Hadlock formula normal umbilical artery Doppler study normal amniotic fluid Known major fetal anomaly Multiple gestation selective reduction multiple gestation 14 week Previous stillbirth term Indications delivery < 39 week . Common example include : Placenta previa Placenta accreta Vasa previa History classical cesarean section myomectomy Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Oligohydramnios ( low amniotic fluid , define maximum vertical pocket < 2.0cm ) Highrisk pregnancy determine physician . Common example include : Pregestational diabetes gestational diabetes medication Chronic hypertension medication Maternal cardiac disease Asthma require oral steroid pregnancy Chronic renal disease Antiphospholipid syndrome Hyperthyroidism Prior stillbirth Systemic lupus erythematous Hemoglobinopathies sickle cell disease
